title: VA Rock Symphony`s - Reflection (Dutch Treat ^A152 VBR MP3)
description:
Everybody knows the feeling. Oh that great piece on album so and so. Its great but you never play it. Its too long for the audience and such a hustle when you are alone. Same with me.

So I thought lets list these pieces and see whether I could play them in some quite moments when you have the time to listen to music. Not 3 or 4 minutes but real Rock Symphony`s greater than 7 minutes (Brother in Arms is exactly 7 minutes).

So I made five 2-hour playlists (A148-152) and now I play these wonderful compositions once in while (nice). If anyone has some suggestions for monumental Rock Projects I missed?. For some good candidates, like Valentyn Suite and Supper's Ready (Genesis), I could not find a proper recording. Please put them on the net if you have one of these.... Enjoy,

PS: I skipped a few good tracks like Bohemian Rhapsody and Stairway to Heaven (too well known).


Dutch Treat - ^A152 Reflection (Symphonic Rock)

01 The Smashing Pumpkins - Porcelina Of The Vast Oceans
02 Yes - And You And I Cord Of LifeEclipseThe Preacher The TeacherApocalypse
03 Creedence Clearwater Revival - I Heard It Through The Grapevine
04 Tool - Reflection
05 Stone Temple Pilots - Kitchen Ware & Candy Bars
06 New Cool Collective - One More Time
07 Steely Dan - Aja
08 Genesis - Firth Of Fifth
09 Genesis - The Fountain Of Salmacis
10 Dave Matthews Band - The Dreaming Tree
11 Peter Frampton - Do You Feel Like I Do
12 The Blues - Lonely World
13 Oasis - All Around The World
14 Riverside - The Curtain Falls
